example.eg: The little girl wore purple spotty pants and a green top.

dsense.name: spotty
dsense.guideword: UK, informal (having spots or pimples) (非正式用语)

example.eg: Greg uses a special cream to improve his spotty complexion.
Cell phone service is spotty in this area because of the mountains.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 参差不齐的，非始终如一的
